product_name: Kiss My Face Oat Protein Sunscreen - SPF 30 - 0.75 fl. oz.
long_description: Kiss My Face Oat Protein SPF 30 sunscreen provides UVA and UVB protection and is made with oat protein that helps fight signs of aging. Green tea and licorice extracts help fight damaging free radicals; natural hyaluronic acid, aloe and cucumber extract help hydrate and soothe your skin. Hydresia provides extra moisturizing power and quick absorption. Biodegradable sunscreen is paraben free, phthalate free, water resistant and fragrance free. Kiss My Face Oat Protein SPF 30 sunscreen is not tested on animals.
short_description: Kiss My Face Oat Protein SPF 30 sunscreen provides UVA and UVB protection and is made with oat protein that helps fight signs of aging.
